capabilities.name: get_blockchain_info
capabilities.description: Get general Neo N3 blockchain information

capabilities.name: get_block_count
capabilities.description: Get the current block height of the Neo N3 blockchain

capabilities.name: get_block
capabilities.description: Get block details by height or hash

capabilities.name: get_transaction
capabilities.description: Get transaction details by hash

capabilities.name: get_balance
capabilities.description: Get account balance for a specific address

capabilities.name: transfer_assets
capabilities.description: Transfer assets between addresses

capabilities.name: invoke_contract
capabilities.description: Invoke a smart contract method

capabilities.name: create_wallet
capabilities.description: Create a new Neo N3 wallet

capabilities.name: import_wallet
capabilities.description: Import a Neo N3 wallet from private key or WIF

capabilities.name: estimate_transfer_fees
capabilities.description: Estimate fees for a transfer transaction

capabilities.name: check_transaction_status
capabilities.description: Check the status of a transaction

capabilities.name: list_famous_contracts
capabilities.description: List famous Neo N3 contracts supported by the server

capabilities.name: get_contract_info
capabilities.description: Get details about a famous Neo N3 contract

capabilities.name: neofs_create_container
capabilities.description: Create a NeoFS storage container

capabilities.name: neofs_get_containers
capabilities.description: Get containers owned by an address in NeoFS

capabilities.name: neoburger_deposit
capabilities.description: Deposit NEO to NeoBurger to receive bNEO tokens

capabilities.name: neoburger_withdraw
capabilities.description: Withdraw NEO from NeoBurger by returning bNEO tokens

capabilities.name: neoburger_get_balance
capabilities.description: Get bNEO balance of an account

capabilities.name: neoburger_claim_gas
capabilities.description: Claim accumulated GAS rewards from NeoBurger

capabilities.name: flamingo_stake
capabilities.description: Stake FLM tokens on Flamingo

capabilities.name: flamingo_unstake
capabilities.description: Unstake FLM tokens from Flamingo

capabilities.name: flamingo_get_balance
capabilities.description: Get FLM token balance

capabilities.description: Deposit assets into NeoCompound

capabilities.name: neocompound_withdraw
capabilities.description: Withdraw assets from NeoCompound

capabilities.name: neocompound_get_balance
capabilities.description: Get balance of deposited assets in NeoCompound

capabilities.description: Deposit assets into GrandShare pool

capabilities.name: grandshare_withdraw
capabilities.description: Withdraw assets from GrandShare pool

capabilities.name: grandshare_get_pool_details
capabilities.description: Get details about a GrandShare pool
